senses.sense_definition: A short, thick-walled plant cell found in stems and fruits, often responsible for a gritty texture.

examples.text: The characteristic gritty texture of a pear is caused by the presence of numerous <w>brachysclereids</w> in its flesh.
Under the microscope, the <w>brachysclereid</w> appeared as a distinct, stone-like cell among the softer tissues.
